mapper.insert:
insert into
ID,
USER_ID,
CERT_TYPE,
CERT_NO,
CERT_NAME,
CERT_EXP_FLAG,

OCR_ORG,

#{id},
#{userId},
#{certType},
#{certNo},
#{certName},
#{certExpFlag},
#{certExpBegin},
#{certExpEnd},
#{sex},

mapper.update:
update
ID=#{id},
USER_ID=#{userId},
CERT_TYPE=#{certType},
CERT_NO=#{certNo},
CERT_NAME=#{certName},
CERT_EXP_FLAG=#{certExpFlag},
CERT_EXP_BEGIN=#{certExpBegin},
CERT_EXP_END=#{certExpEnd},
SEX=#{sex},
BIRTHDAY=#{birthday},
COUNTRY=#{country},
NATION=#{nation},
BACKGROUND=#{background},
RELIGION=#{religion},
MARRIAGE=#{marriage},
EDU_BG=#{eduBg},
JOB=#{job},
EMAIL=#{email},
QQ=#{qq},
WEIXIN=#{weixin},
SIGN=#{sign},
PRE_INFO=#{preInfo},
ECIF_CUST_NO=#{ecifCustNo},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME=#{lastUpdateTime},
REMARK1=#{remark1},
REMARK2=#{remark2},
REMARK3=#{remark3},
POST_CODE=#{postCode},
MONTHLY_INCOME=#{monthlyIncome},
TELEPHONE=#{telephone},
IS_FUND=#{isFund},
CAREER_TYPE=#{careerType},
OCR_ORG=#{ocrOrg},
OCR_ADDRESS_ZONE=#{ocrAddressZone},
CONFIDENCE=#{confidence},
DIST_CODE=#{distCode},
PIC_HEAD=#{picHead},
PIC_CERT_FRONT=#{picCertFront},
PIC_CERT_BACK=#{picCertBack}
where ID=#{id}
